text: Maru is a famous cat on the internet. He is from Japan and he is famous for sliding on his belly. A lot of people like to watch videos of Maru and look at pictures of him on his website. Maru also has a friend named Harry, who is a hedgehog. == References == == Other websites == * Maru's website * Maru's gallery application for Android Category:Internet celebrity animals Category:Individual cats
title: Maru (cat)
